title: I have a suggestion for a new Forum/rule.

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I have an idea for a new section on the Forums.
  • I believe a certain rule should be enforced on the Forums.

sections.title: Cause
content: Unity are always open to new ideas and suggestions that make the community experience much better for our users. This can include suggesting new sub-forums for our users to discuss certain topics on or implementing a new rule if you think there is a need to do so.

sections.title: Resolution
content: We welcome all Forum/rule suggestions to be posted in our Feedback area. Please ensure that you have searched the Feedback pages to see if your suggestion has already been posted or not, as it may have already been discussed.
